text: Jacques-Maurice Couve de Murville (; 24 January 1907 â€“ 24 December 1999) was a French diplomat and politician. He was Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1958 to 1968 and Prime Minister from 1968 to 1969 under the presidency of General de Gaulle. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Prime ministers of France Category:French Ministers of Finance Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Reims
